poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Bleach is whiten or black, Botch is wreck or repair. Broaches breach or bedeck; They can make a barque wallow - Not birch bark. Some beechmast, maybe, In a hot bright purple borsch, Me the butcher adding this batch of words, Batch as in 'bacio', a kiss; it's from baking and brewing. And a blotch of smetana on top.
